All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AboutController
Controller that handles requests to the "/about" URL.
AccountsAdminController
AccountsAdminController handles requests for viewing and editing user accounts in the admin panel.
AuthFilter
Servlet Filter implementation for authentication and authorization.
BlogController
Controller that handles requests to the "/blogs" URL.
BlogDetailController
Controller that handles blog detail view requests.
BlogManagementController
Servlet for managing blogs in the admin panel.
BlogModel
Represents a blog post in the system.
BlogService
 
CategoryManagementController
Servlet for managing categories in the admin panel.
CategoryModel
Represents a category to which a blog post can belong.
CategoryService
 
ContactAdminController
Servlet for managing contacts in the admin panel.
ContactController
Controller that handles rendering the contact form and processing contact submissions.
ContactModel
Represents a contact message sent by a user or visitor.
ContactService
 
CookieUtil
Utility class for managing cookies in a web application.
DashboardController
Servlet for displaying the admin/user dashboard.
DbConfig
DbConfig handles the configuration and connection setup for the MySQL database.
ErrorHandler
It processes unhandled exceptions or HTTP errors.
FavoriteBlogModel
 
FavouriteController
FavouriteController handles requests to the "/favourites" route.
FormUtils
Utility class for handling form data extraction from HttpServletRequest.
HomeController
HomeController handles requests to the root path ("/").
ImageUtil
Utility class for handling image upload operations in web applications.
LoginController
LoginController handles the user login process.
LogoutController
LogoutController handles user logout functionality.
PasswordUtil
Utility class for secure password encryption and decryption using AES-GCM.
RegisterController
RegisterController handles user registration requests.
RoleModel
Represents a user role in the system.
RoleService
 
SearchController
SearchController handles blog search requests.
SessionUtil
Utility class for managing HTTP sessions in a web application.
UserManagementController
Servlet to handle User Management in admin panel.
UserModel
Represents a user in the system.
UserService
 
ValidationUtil
Utility class for validating various types of input data.
